# Using the fingertipsR package to fetch and analyse public health outcomes data

This notebook documents use of the [fingertipsR package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/fingertipsR/README.html). First we need to import it:

```{r}
source <- devtools:::source_pkg("C:/path/to/fingertips-master")
install(source)
```
